name: Monster Beast
description:
Tap to Control The Monster Beast. Avoid hitting the spikes!

Collect the coins. But don’t you forget to look out for enemies and obstacles!

Monster Beast is great for every age. Young and old can compete against each other. Families can enjoy lots of fun with this game. Just enjoy the flight around monster land and collect all the coins. 5 Coins = 1 Point

√ Beautiful design
√ Challenging achievements
√ Fun to play for everyone
√ Be at the top of the Leader boards
√ Great music

Download Monster Beast Now and have fun!

89f3e0b12e
